elements.label: Guard Schedule
elements.description: We know when the night is darkest, we know when the guards change, we know who drinks to pass the time.

elements.label: Crooked Alley
elements.description: Within the unsavory part of town lies a hidden empire. This street demarks its border.

elements.label: Drunken Gangsters
elements.description: In the crooked little alley is a crooked little bar, where the crooked little men celebrate their crooked little lives.

elements.label: Walled-in Warehouse Lot
elements.description: Next to the alley, a wall. Beyond the wall, a courtyard. Inside the courtyard, a warehouse. Inside the warehouse, a vault. And inside the vault, treasure.

elements.label: The Warren
elements.description: A labyrinth of passages, offices and refurbished store-rooms. Somewhere within these passages, lies a Vault.

elements.label: The Safe
